title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Predictable AI Agents with Pega and Amazon Bedrock (MAM104)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用Pega和Amazon Bedrock构建可预测的AI代理 (MAM104)
abstract: Transform the back-office from a cost center into a competitive advantage with Pega Predictable AI Agents, powered by Amazon Bedrock and orchestrated through Pega GenAI Blueprint. Learn how companies like Rabobank are automating their middle-to-back-office operations, achieving scalable transformation and accelerated pace of change while maintaining operational excellence across their enterprise. This presentation is brought to you by Pega, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 通过Pega可预测AI代理将后台办公从成本中心转变为竞争优势，该代理由Amazon Bedrock提供支持并通过Pega GenAI Blueprint进行编排。了解像荷兰合作银行这样的公司如何自动化其中后台办公操作，实现可扩展的转型和加速的变革步伐，同时在整个企业中保持卓越运营。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Pega为您呈现。
